contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 20, 1981 D Skelmersdale Contest (Section A)
Skelmersdale Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest-section-a
Brookfield School, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes 1st £85 and trophy, 2nd £70 and trophy, 3rd £35 and cup, 4th cup. Best cornet - Greenalls. Best trombone - Longridge. Best euphonium - Pemberton. Best horn - Prescot. 5 bands competed.
June 25, 2016, 6:52 a.m. June 25, 2016, 7:07 a.m.
1 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Stephen Brodie Spectrum [Vinter]
2 Bedford (Leigh) Band Alan Marsh The Shipbuilders
3 Greenalls Band John Hudson Triumphant Rhapsody
4 Longridge Band J. Roberts Sea Dogs
5 Prescot Cables K. Lawton Sunset Rhapsody
Withdrawn British Aerospace (Chadderton) Unknown
